function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High infectivity rate of COVID-19","Impact":"Widespread transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Reduce human-to-human contact, disinfection, and proper self-hygiene","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, face masks, disinfectants","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Underestimated modes of transmission","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through unrecognized modes","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies to assess potential modes of transmission","Technologies":"Research studies, data collection techniques","People":"Research scientists, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Impacted medical practice","Impact":"Increased risk to healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, medical gear","People":"Health professionals, medical staff","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"}]}
